divs: Sighting Details st klamath falls OR went outside to smoke with girlfriend,she said whats that. looked up seen triangle shaped red blue and white lights flashing all together mixed flashing no pattern to color flashes.seems to be hovering in sky. might have moved alittle bit. but not much outside for 5 minutes still there when went back inside.it is south east of Klamath Falls it is 11:35 pm looked out window it is still there. event started at 11:15 pacific Time
Summary: Blue red white lights hovering south east of klamath falls OR.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Klamath Falls
There were no other sightings in Klamath Falls on or around November 14th 2008
